ol.li: Preparation is key: establish suitable attachment points, prevent unintentional loosening, verify that there is rescue equipment and/or rescue kit at the point of work prior to the work commencing. Failure to stage the equipment prior to the task beginning, could result in further injury to the employee. It is critical to have the equipment ready in order to promptly begin the rescue efforts.

Use of approved rescue equipment which has to be present at the site:
Relevant CE/ANSI marking
Declaration of Conformity
Instructions for use and maintenance
